title: Achaicus
content:
ACHAICUS

An early Christian convert in Corinth. Achaicus, Stephanas, and Fortunatus were visiting Paul in Ephesus when he wrote 1 Corinthians (1 Corinthians 16:17). Achaicus and his friends probably brought Paul a letter from the Corinthian church and returned with Paulâ€™s reply (1 Corinthians 7:1).
